scenes.description: Mori Calliope and Takanashi Kiara finishing their MC segment and introducing the next stage.
Transition and introduction for Hakos Baelz.
Transition and introduction for Watson Amelia.

subtitles.original: That's right, I'm not just a streamer...

subtitles.english: A-M-E! Check it out, check it out!

subtitles.original: When we first met...
subtitles.english: When we first met...

subtitles.original: ...I wonder what you think of me.
subtitles.english: ...I wonder what you think of me.

subtitles.original: The image was set...
subtitles.english: The image was set...

subtitles.original: ...it was a perfect narrative.
subtitles.english: ...it was a perfect narrative.

subtitles.original: But as time went by, I forgot to hide...

subtitles.original: ...the laughs that came so naturally.
subtitles.english: ...the laughs that came so naturally.

subtitles.original: Through lows and highs...

subtitles.original: Now no matter where or when we are...
subtitles.english: Now no matter where or when we are...

subtitles.english: Magical, mythical...

subtitles.original: ...nothing can stop us now. Let's go!

subtitles.english: Chiku Taku, where does time go?

subtitles.english: Fuwa fuwa, how should I go?

subtitles.original: ...the clock won't stop spinning. Fuwa fuwa fuwa!
